items.input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

conversationHistory.content:
Find headquarters location for the portfolio company. Use perplexity_search to find city, state, and full address. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location: {city, state, full_address, research_confidence}}. Include no comments in your response.

Inputs:
input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

content.text: Let me search for Evolve Med Spa's headquarters location.

input.query: Evolve Med Spa headquarters location address Revelstoke Capital portfolio company

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s headquarters is in Hoboken, New Jersey; third‑party firmographics list the corporate office address as 706 Grand St, Hoboken, NJ 07030, USA.[1][2]

Additional context:
- Evolve Med Spa operates multiple New Jersey locations (e.g., a Hoboken clinic at 1025 Maxwell Lane and a Montclair clinic at 46 S Park St), but these are service locations rather than the corporate HQ.[5][3]
- The query mentions Revelstoke Capital; however, Revelstoke’s public portfolio listings do not show Evolve Med Spa, and I did not find confirmation that Evolve Med Spa is a Revelstoke Capital portfolio company.[4] If you need verification of ownership or sponsor, I can check state filings or recent transaction announcements.

Sources:
1. https://www.zoominfo.com/pic/evolve-med-spa/529980418
2. https://www.lusha.com/business/48091faf4fc23f0b/
3. https://www.bbb.org/us/nj/montclair/profile/medical-spa/evolve-med-spa-0221-90211031
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com
5. https://evolvemedspa.com/in/new-jersey/hoboken-nj/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

input.query: Evolve Med Spa Revelstoke Capital Partners ownership acquisition investment status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa was acquired by a private equity group in April 2024; multiple deal briefings name only a “private equity group” and do not publicly identify the buyer by name, and Revelstoke Capital Partners is not listed as the acquirer in those announcements[1][2]. As of the latest available disclosures, there is no confirmed public record that Revelstoke Capital Partners acquired or invested in Evolve Med Spa[1][2][3].

Key details
- Acquisition event: Viper Partners announced it served as exclusive sell-side advisor on the acquisition of Evolve Med Spa by a private equity group, dated April 5, 2024[1]. Healthcare Dealflow summarized the same announcement and likewise did not identify the buyer[2].  
- Buyer identity: Neither the Viper Partners press release nor the deal repost identifies the private equity firm by name[1][2].  
- Revelstoke portfolio check: Revelstoke Capital Partners’ published investments page does not list Evolve Med Spa among its portfolio companies as of the latest snapshot reviewed[3].  
- Related sector activity: Revelstoke has invested in aesthetics/consumer-health platforms (e.g., NakedMD announced later in 2024), but that does not establish ownership of Evolve Med Spa[4]. This is industry context rather than evidence of Evolve ownership.

Answering your query directly
- Ownership/acquisition: Evolve Med Spa was acquired by an unnamed private equity buyer announced April 5, 2024[1][2].  
- Revelstoke involvement: No public confirmation links Revelstoke Capital Partners to the Evolve Med Spa transaction; Evolve is not on Revelstoke’s disclosed portfolio list[3].  
- Investment status today: Post-acquisition, Evolve is private equity–owned, but the sponsor remains undisclosed in cited public sources[1][2]. If you need definitive confirmation, it likely requires direct company press releases or regulatory filings not covered in the above announcements.

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
3. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/
4. https://www.stout.com/en/news/stout-advises-nakedmd-growth-investment-revelstoke-capital-partner
5. https://media.mcguirewoods.com/publications/2023/Private-Equity-in-Healthcare.pdf


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

conversationHistory.content:
Find legal entity name using perplexity_search query: 'What legal entity is DBA [company name], a portfolio company of [pe firm name]?' Only proceed if status: 'PROCEED_TO_FORM_5500'. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location, portfolio_verification, employee_count_assessment, legal_entity_research: {legal_entity_name, research_confidence, source_info}, status: 'LEGAL_ENTITY_FOUND' or 'LEGAL_ENTITY_UNCLEAR'}. Include no comments in your response.

conversationHistory.content:
Test Form 5500 matches using form5500_name_test. Only proceed if status: 'LEGAL_ENTITY_FOUND' or 'LEGAL_ENTITY_UNCLEAR'. Search order: 1) Legal entity name from previous task 2) Original company name 3) Shortened versions (remove suffixes) 4) Common variations. Inclusive search returns broader results, so start broad. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location, portfolio_verification, employee_count_assessment, legal_entity_research, form5500_match: {legal_name, ein, location, match_type, record_count, variation_used}, status: 'READY_FOR_EXTRACTION' or 'NEEDS_ADVANCED_RESOLUTION'}. Include no comments in your response.
